availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Calloway County, Kentucky, in 1848, 1849 and from 1851 to 1853. Appointed Justice of the Peace of the Calloway County Court in Calloway County in 1860.

bibl.p: Lewis Collins, Collinsâ€™ Historical Sketches of Kentucky: History of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington: Collins & Co., 1874), 773. Find A Grave, "Francis Ulysses Dodds (1809 - 1880)," Memorial #64846937, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=64846937 (accessed July 21, 2017).
